name: salary
description: regular job salary which considers as constant income source.

name: interest
description: interest earned from savings account, HYSA, CD, etc.

name: investment
description:
realized profit or loss from investment. 
 investing can be made for options, stocks, buying properties, passive investor or angel investor to business, bonds, govt schemes, CD, etc.

name: passive income
description: getting earning from investment or business, where you don't work much, it is not the salary

name: nri transfer
description: currency remittence from other country. this is not actually income, but simply consider as currency converter/transfer.

name: gift
description: this is giving myself. Someone or me gives gifts, on special occasions such as festival, birthday, anniversaries, rakshabandhan, Diwali, Christmas, get together after, welcome home party, wedding, donation, family functions, events, etc.

name: business
description: earning from business such as renting a room, airBnB, vending machine etc.
